meanings.definition: A person who comes to live in a place from somewhere else.
meanings.sent1: The incomers in our neighborhood are from a different country.
meanings.sent2: The town welcomed the incomers with open arms.
meanings.sent3: The incomers brought new recipes to the potluck dinner.
meanings.sent4: The incomers infused the community with fresh perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The incomers added a vibrant energy to the town.

meanings.definition: A group of people who come to live in a place from somewhere else.
meanings.sent1: The incomers gathered at the community center for a welcome party.
meanings.sent2: The incomers settled in the new town quickly.
meanings.sent3: The incomers organized a cultural exchange event.
meanings.sent4: The incomers transformed the local market with their products.
meanings.sent5: The incomers formed a close-knit community within a short time.
